mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG(BLOG_ID, TITLE, REG_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES( BLOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{title} , sysdate , sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BLOG WHERE BLOG_ID = #{ blogId }
mapper.select: SELECT blog_id, title, reg_date FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reg_date DESC) AS SEQ, blog_id, title, reg_date FROM blog ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY blog_id DESC
